id.description: The ID of this security group rule.

security_group_id.description: The security group ID to associate with this security group rule.

direction.description: Ingress or egress, which is the direction in which the metering rule is applied.

ethertype.description: Must be IPv4 or IPv6, and addresses represented in CIDR must match the ingress or egress rules.

port_range_max.description: The maximum port number in the range that is matched by the security group rule.

port_range_min.description: The minimum port number in the range that is matched by the security group rule.

protocol.description: The IP protocol can be represented by a string, an integer, or null.

remote_ip_prefix.description: The remote IP prefix to associate with this metering rule packet.

remote_group_id.description: The remote group UUID to associate with this security group rule.
